statements: UPDATE emergency_contacts SET city='New York', state='NY' WHERE id=1;

UPDATE emergency_contacts SET name = 'John Doe', phone_number = '123-456-7890', email = 'johndoe@example.com', address = '123 Main St', city = 'New York', state = 'NY', zip_code = '10001' WHERE id = 1;
